description: Have you read the /b/Book/b/? Well, I'll give you a rundown of this /6/technological journey/6/ anyway; you'll thank me.

What you'll be doing is practically /a/--Modern Industrialization--/a/, using a plethora of different mechanics from /b/Logistics/b/ to /6/Distillation/6/, allowing for /6/Total Automation/6/. I'll give some /6/examples/6/:

You'll have access to powerful /b/Logistics Tools/b/ such as /b/Multipart Items/b/ and /b/Fluid Pipes/b/ as well as /b/Energy Cables/b/. This means up to three of each can go into a /b/Single Block/b/!
You won't ever need to go mining for resources again as you'll have the ability to construct /b/Quarries/b/ for continuous resource generation!

You'll eventually need to /6/power/6/ all your /b/Machines/b/, /b/Steam/b/ or not. You'll have to use /b/Steam/b/ and /b/Oil/b/ processed into /b/Diesel/b/ through /6/Distillation/6/, /6/Nuclear Fission/6/, and at total mechanical dominance: /6/Fusion/6/. You can boost energy transfer rates using /b/Higher Voltages/b/.

Never want to /6/manually/6/ put together a /b/Gear/b/, /b/Hammer/b/ or /b/Rod/b/ ever again? Good thing this is a world for you to design. You'll be able to make a machine for just about anything! Total automation is completely possible and you can do it while flying around with a /b/Gravi-Chestplate/b/.
/a/Are you ready for the journey of a lifetime?/a/ /c/Time to get going!/c/

/6/P.S/6/. If you ever get stumped up with a machine, go ahead and hold that /b/Guide Book/b/ of yours while /6/hovering/6/ over a /b/Machine/b/ or /b/Multiblock/b/. It'll give you some /b/extra info/b/.
